alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 3:23PM MST until December 28 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 4 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Northeast Highlands
